references.paper_title: 3DMatch: Learning local geometric descriptors from RGB-D reconstructions
references.reason: This paper introduces a method for learning local geometric descriptors from RGB-D reconstructions, which is a fundamental technique used in many point cloud registration tasks.

references.paper_title: Scan2CAD: Learning CAD model alignment in RGB-D scans
references.reason: This paper introduces the Scan2CAD dataset, a benchmark dataset widely used for evaluating multi-instance point cloud registration methods.

references.paper_title: Neural-guided RANSAC: Learning where to sample model hypotheses
references.reason: This paper proposes Neural-guided RANSAC, which improves the efficiency and robustness of RANSAC for point cloud registration.
This paper introduces ShapeNet, a large-scale dataset of 3D models that is frequently used for training and evaluating 3D deep learning models.
This paper proposes a fast global registration method, which is essential for efficient multi-instance point cloud registration.
